summary: priscilla presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding to be held at an all - new chapel of love in las vegas . the 69 - year - old collaborated with nbc 's today show to launch a contest for one elvis - obsessed couple to win the ' ultimate wedding ' . the winning duo - announced next monday - will tie the knot at elvis presley 's graceland wedding chapel inside the westgate hotel on thursday , april 23 .

aspect: 1. Priscilla Presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding at a new chapel of love in Las Vegas.
2. The winning couple will get married at the Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel inside the Westgate Hotel.
3. The wedding chapel is part of the first permanent Graceland exhibit of the singer's artifacts outside his home.
4. Couples can enter a contest to win the ultimate wedding.
5. Priscilla Presley made it clear that no impersonators will be involved.
6. The winning couple will win a free wedding reception and hotel suite.
7. The chapel is not a joke, according to Priscilla Presley.
explain: The given aspect states that Priscilla Presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding at a new chapel of love in Las Vegas. This highlights her role in the upcoming wedding event and her association with the new chapel.
The winning couple will marry at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel which is located inside the Westgate Hotel.
The aspect highlights that the wedding chapel in the Westgate hotel is a permanent exhibit of Elvis Presley's artifacts, making it a special place for fans and couples alike to marry.

The aspect mentions that couples can enter a contest to win the ultimate wedding. This means that the winning couple will get to tie the knot at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel inside the Westgate Hotel on Thursday, April 23rd. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for couples who are fans of Elvis Presley and want to get married in a unique and memorable setting.
According to the aspect, Priscilla Presley has made it clear that no Elvis impersonators will be involved in the upcoming wedding at the Chapel of Love.
The winning couple will win a free wedding reception and hotel suite at the Westgate Hotel.
According to Priscilla Presley, the chapel is not a joke but rather a serious and sacred place for couples to get married.
